job.title: Senior Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: <p>Position:&nbsp;Site Reliability Engineer</p><p>Location: Remote till Covid, Weehawken, NJ</p><p>Type of job: Contract</p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p>JOB Description&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p><br></p><ul><li>location: the initially remote post that Weehawken US once situation normalize.</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>Primary skills for a new&nbsp;SRE:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><ul><li>Linux administration</li><li>Bash shell scripting</li><li>Experience with Azure or another cloud provider</li><li>Docker and Kubernetes</li><li>Experience with Application performance monitoring tools.</li><li>Experience with any languages for querying log data – search processing language (Splunk), Kusto (Azure), Kibana query language (Elasticsearch)</li><li>SQL</li><li>Understanding of&nbsp;SRE&nbsp;concepts.</li><li>Git</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>Additional skills:</p><ul><li>Python</li><li>Infrastructure as code (Terraform, Puppet, Chef or Ansible)</li><li>DevOps build automation and CI/CD (Gerrit, Maven, Jenkins, Nexus, Artifactory, Selenium)</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p>Thanks&nbsp;</p><p>Ashwini</p><p>4085569096</p><p>ashwini@tsourceinc.net</p><p></p>
